ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then He eases the way for him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then made his passage easy (at birth);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and then made the course of life easy for him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and made the path of guidance easy for him to follow.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then eased the way for him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then He made the path easy for him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then (as for) the way-- He has made it easy (for him)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then the way eased for him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then maketh the way easy for him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He makes his path easy for him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then the way He made easy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then He made the way easy for him;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then doth He make His path smooth for him;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then He makes the Path easy for him;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: then eased his path for him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then He eased the way for him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then He eased the way for him;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [80:20] Then He made the way, his exit from his mother’s belly, easy for him;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then maketh the way easy for him) He made clear to him the way of good and the way of evil; and it is also said this means: He made easy for him to come out of the way of the womb,
